data.name: Add New Users
Read Users
Edit User Information
Allows the permanent deletion of user accounts.
data.value: 允許永久刪除用戶帳戶。

data.name: Delete Users
Grants permission to create new user accounts.
data.value: 授予建立新用戶帳戶的權限。

data.name: Allows viewing the list of all users.
data.value: 允許查看所有用戶列表。

data.name: Allows modification of user details like email and roles, and can also reset user passwords.
data.value: 允許修改使用者詳細資料，例如電郵地址和角色，並可重設使用者密碼。

data.name: Delete Roles
Read Roles
Allows viewing the list of roles and their assigned permissions.
data.value: 允許查看角色列表及其分配的權限。

data.name: Add New Roles
Edit Role Information
Allows the permanent deletion of roles.
Grants permission to create new roles.
data.value: 授予創建新角色嘅權限。

data.name: Allows modification of role names and their assigned permissions.
data.value: 允許修改角色名稱及其分配的權限。

data.name: Allows viewing system-level information and settings.
data.value: 允許查看系統級資訊和設定。

data.name: Assign Roles to Users
View System Context
Allows assigning or removing roles for any user.
data.value: 允許為任何用戶分配或移除角色。

data.name: Reboot This App
Grants permission to restart the application instance. May cause availability interruptions but all settings and cache will be reloaded.
data.value: 授予重啟應用程式實例嘅權限。可能會導致服務中斷，但所有設定同快取將會重新載入。

data.name: Edit Any Category
Delete Questions
Allows editing of questions, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許編輯問題，不論擁有權。

data.name: Delete Any Category
Allows deletion of questions, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許刪除問題，不論擁有權。

data.name: Edit Questions
Allows deletion of any category, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許刪除任何類別，不論其擁有者為何。

data.name: Allows editing of any category, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許編輯任何類別，不論擁有權。

data.name: Add Questions
Allows adding of questions, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許新增題目，不論擁有權。

data.name: Edit Any KnowledgePoint
Delete Any KnowledgePoint
Allows editing of any knowledgePoint, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許編輯任何知識點，不論其擁有者。

data.name: Add Any KnowledgePoint
Allows deletion of any knowledgePoint, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許刪除任何知識點，不論其擁有者為何。

data.name: Allows adding of any knowledgePoint, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許新增任何知識點，不論其擁有者為何。

data.name: Delete Articles
Edit Articles
Allows editing of articles, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許編輯文章，不論所有權。

data.name: Allows deletion of articles, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許刪除文章，不論所有權。

data.name: Add Articles
Allows adding of articles, regardless of ownership.
data.value: 允許新增文章，不論擁有權。
